text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to explain the remedy of applying to the Land Registry for alteration of the register under Schedule 4 of the Land Registration Act 2002, specifically if the user's signature was forged on the charge. The candidate answer discusses constructive trust, priority disputes, notice, and fraud against the bank, but it never mentions the specific statutory remedy under Schedule 4 of the LRA 2002 for rectifying the register due to a forged disposition (which would cover a forged signature on the mortgage deed).", "criterion_id": "5df08777-f880-4c82-9dcf-dce7be3d9b77"}
